text:
@michaelgove @MarosSefcovic This is mad, completely mad. It will be a further hit of minus 5-6% to GDP. Farmers and the motor manufacturing will be out of business. 
“Take Back Control”?? Given the ineptitude of the government’s handling of the coronavirus fiasco, this is going to be terrifying!!
